content: adjacent square 4 remains row 6 decrease connect to next edge st of adjacent square 3 on hook half_double_crochet in the next single_crochet the same place you will pick up the 1st loop on the next triangle skip lastly this half_double_crochet after the last triangle once all triangles are completed slip_stitch to the start of the first triangle and fasten_off finishing weave in any tails block by washing the entire garment push out the excess water and arrange garment on a flat surface a good way to remove the excess water after washing is to sandwich the item between two towels roll the sandwich into a cylinder and stomp on it many times the towels soak up the excess water leaving the garment only damp unroll the cylinder and place the garment in a shaded area to dry © abbeymade 2021 7 tessellated sampler cowl charts the charts provided are not intended to replace the written pattern please refer to the written pattern and helpful videos especially if you are a beginner tss single_crochet tfs 1st edge st slip_stitch/tss slip_stitch twisted up tss connecting st decrease/increase combo tps last edge st yarn over increase increase/decrease combo decrease tss2tog panel a starting triangles panel b lace 1 panel c tunisian simple stitch tss panel d tunisian full stitch tfs © abbeymade 2021 8 tessellated sampler cowl panel f false rib panel h honeycomb panel j lace 2 panel k finishing triangles please share your wips and finished cowl on social media use hashtags #tessellatedsamplercowl #tessellateme #abbeymade if you have any questions about the
